org.jetel.util.file

Class FileURLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.file.FileURLParser

  • public class FileURLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class with some useful methods regarding file string manipulation

    • Method Detail

      • getURLMatcher

        public static java.util.regex.Matcher getURLMatcher(java.lang.String source)
        Finds embedded source. Example: source: zip:(http://linuxweb/~jausperger/employees.dat.zip)#employees0.dat result: (g1) zip: (g2) http://linuxweb/~jausperger/employees.dat.zip (g3) #employees0.dat
        Parameters:
        source - - input/output source
        Returns:
        matcher or null
